A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie with great acting\, some of the best scenes that will go down in Star Wars history\, the movie was dragged down by the subplot in the movie\, which I enjoyed but it slowed down the movie. Some of the humor felt out of place but I didn’t mind it to much. The parts of this movie that I love the most are the scenes with Rey and Luke. There characters collide at first but become more as a mentor relationship. As a whole I love this movie.
